Photo / NZTA
Lawyer Tyrone Barugh fails bid to claim $5000 from Jetstar in booking loophole https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-tyrone-barugh-fails-bid-to-collect-5000-windfall-from-jetstar-after-finding-booking-loophole/BZG2DKBEWND5LEAU23EM7QYV2Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyer-tyrone-barugh-fails-bid-to-collect-5000-windfall-from-jetstar-after-finding-booking-loophole/BZG2DKBEWND5LEAU23EM7QYV2Q/ Jeremy WilkinsonJustice wouldn't be served by giving the man money he didn't have to start with: Tribunal Fri, 08 Nov 2024 23:00:00 +0000 Tyrone Barugh, a director of a law firm Spilt Milk in Wellington, argued Jetstar owes him thousands of dollars in fees. Photo / Supplied
